post.author: thomas lee

comment.author: 황성규
comment.content: 한가지 타입추가: 수영은 안하고 Hot tub/Sauna만 하는 사람.

post.content:
There are 4 kinds of groups I met
- Rehab type : heart operation, some kind of health problem - old aged home type : plain old folks - overweight type : out of shape people - regular : very few
*Comments : Even good swimmers are out of shape. I am asking questions to myself. "Is swimming good exercise ?" "How can I make swimming as decent exercise ?"
*Last words : Everybody is in pretty good shape in running club. What am I missing ?
post.title: People I met at the swimming pool
